QuestData.Title: A Burning Threat
QuestData.Description: While we cast our eyes toward the cataclysm, who watches our backs? While our leaders take up arms against Deathwing, the Burning Blade plots our downfall.$B$BEven as we speak, they are gathering recruits and supplies at the farm to the southwest. I care not to meet death at the hands of the Burning Legion. It's time we take matters into our own hands.$B$B$n, will you help me keep the vigil? Go and slaughter their ranks before it's too late.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 members of the Burning Blade at the farm to the southwest.
QuestData.CompletionText: I may be old and retired, but my mind is still as sharp as my sword.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. This old orc will sleep more safely at night.
